description: Single storey outbuilding for ancillary use as office/study. Removal of part of wall to create access.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

OS01 - Location plan, PR00 A - Site plan and street elevation, PR01 A - Proposed floor plan, PR02 A - Proposed roof plan, PR03 A - Proposed elevations, PR04 A - Proposed elevations and section, EX00- Existing site plan, EX01 - Existing floor plans, EX02 - Existing roof plan, EX03 - Existing elevations, EX04 - Existing elevations and section
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 1E Freeland Road, London W5 3HR only and not for any other use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the  site and to ensure that the  use of the building does not, by reason  of  any  other  activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document  (2013), policy D6 of  the  London  Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| Prior to occupation of the outbuilding, the part of the wall (as shown on the East facing elevation on drawing number PR04 Rev A and measuring 1.8m in width) shall be removed. This opening (between the garden areas) shall then remain in place for perpetuity and shall not at any time be enclosed or 'blocked up'. This is to ensure that these garden areas shall not become separated whilst the outbuilding is in place.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the  site and to ensure that the  use of the building does not, by reason  of  any  other  activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document  (2013), policy D6 of  the  London  Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
subdivision_of_building: 1E Freeland Road: Erection of a single storey outbuilding for ancillary use to 1E Freeland Road as office/study.
